wikipedia_page.main: Judy Gunn, born Joan Winfindale (10 February 1915 – 19 April 1991) was a British stage and film actress.When she was thirteen, she played a leading role in a local dramatic performance and the following year she went to RADA to study, where she was the youngest pupil. After two years there she was engaged for provincial repertory work and commenced her career with touring companies before starting on the London stage. In 1933 she starred alongside Bobby Howes in the West End musical He Wanted Adventure.
